trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brownwood
There were no other sightings in Brownwood on or around December 24th 2010
Summary: 2 fireballs moving west to east overhead
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside facing west to get something out of my car and saw two "fireballs" at almost eye level moving west to east overhead very slowly with no audible sound. I ran inside to tell my dad and came outside to find them directly overhead. I could not tell if it was a ball or disk. From underneath it was definitely lit up by an orange almost flickering light. It almost seemed like it was a round kitelike object being lit underneath by a fire. They continued to float eastward and veered towards eachother and separated. As they floated out of site I noticed a third light sitting further south that didn't seem to be moving but had the same flickering appearance. It slowly floated away. My cell doesn't have video but I got one awful picture. These things completely confused me and I still don't know what I saw but it wasnt a jet or a helicopter. Still have a rush
